Address.Address1: Av. Alemania A-B 108, El Cortecito, Bávaro Punta Cana, DRPunta Cana

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: The resort is located in El Cortecito beach in Punta Cana and boasts spacious, modern and magnificent rooms designed for your enjoyment and relaxation. We offer our guests fully exclusive personalized options available 24/7. The resort has multiple facilities and service areas, which includes among others, a wide variety of bars and restaurants. 652 Rooms full equip to offer you a comfort and relaxing stay.All our rooms with beautiful views either the gardens, the pools or the ocean. All inclusive service allows guests to choose between different à la carte and buffet-style restaurants which offer a wide variety of culinary delights and a selection of cocktails and international beverages There is a recreational area with billiards, ping-pong and football tables. We also have a videogame area available. The beach holds a volleyball court and the gardens have both archery and batting ranges. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding and no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated
